guidelines: Use Next.js App Router for routing and layouts
Implement responsive design using Tailwind CSS utility classes
Ensure WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility compliance
Use semantic HTML elements for better SEO
Optimize images with Next.js Image component
Implement proper meta tags for SEO and social sharing
Use CSS variables for theming and design tokens
Keep components small, focused, and reusable
Implement proper error boundaries and loading states
Use Server Components by default, Client Components when needed
Optimize for Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)
Test with keyboard navigation and screen readers
best_practices: Implement design system with consistent spacing and colors
Use rem/em units for scalable typography
Implement proper form validation and error messages
Use lazy loading for images and heavy components
Implement skeleton loaders for better perceived performance
Test across different browsers and devices
Use React DevTools and Lighthouse for optimization
Document component props and usage examples
